resources.string:
"WARNING: This will completely destroy caches for all CM themes installed on your device, allowing your next boot to build all your themes again directly from the APK.

This should be used after a dirty flash with the theme applied.

Your next boot duration will be directly proportional to the amount of themes you have installed on your device.

It is recommended for you to reboot one more time after the cache rebuild, so that you clear yourself from lags and stutters."
